TOP_PORTS_TCP.title: TOP_PORTS_TCP
TOP_PORTS_TCP.description: Scan TOP_PORTS_TCP most common TCP ports. Defaults to 250.

TOP_PORTS_UDP.title: TOP_PORTS_UDP
TOP_PORTS_UDP.description: Scan TOP_PORTS_UDP most common UDP ports. Defaults to 10.

MIN_VLSM_IPV4.title: MIN_VLSM_IPV4
MIN_VLSM_IPV4.description: Minimum variable-length subnet mask for IPv4-ranges. Defaults to 0. Use this value to prevent scanning large ranges.

MIN_VLSM_IPV6.title: MIN_VLSM_IPV6
MIN_VLSM_IPV6.description: Minimum variable-length subnet mask for IPv6-ranges. Defaults to 0. Use this value to prevent scanning large ranges.
